TestCase.name: BA_AC_004
TestCase.description: BIOABS Checking Full Record page display and functionality

step.description: Prerequisite: BIOABS General Search. Check Page Display
step.substep: Clicking Link 'Selected database link'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Text: 'quality.tester@testcases.com' was sent to the 'Email' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='email']")), textbox content after sending is 'quality.tester@testcases.com'
Text: '!12345654321a' was sent to the 'Password' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='password']")), textbox content after sending is '!12345654321a'

step.description: Prerequisite:BIOABS Full Record Check Page Display
step.expected: Search is performed correct and booleans operators are worked correctly.
step.substep: Clicking Button 'Clear All Fields'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Button 'Select years dropDown'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Button 'Select all years from dropdown'. Expected result: True.
Enter search field - search field = Title, search term = water consume
Clicking Link 'Times Cited: highest to lowest'. Expected result: True.
Click on Full Record Title link for record #1 on Results Summary page
Clicking Link 'First Title'. Expected result: True.

step.description: Perform one-click search for all available fields

step.description: Navigate to Citing Articles from Easy Viewing

step.description: Check Navigation to Related records from Enhanced Panel
step.expected: Navigation to Related records from Enhanced Panel is working correctly
step.substep: Link 'Related Records link (sidebar panel)' is displayed
Clicking Link 'Related Records link (sidebar panel)'. Expected result: True.

step.description: Check Creation of Citation Map from enhanced Panel

Clicking Link 'First Title'. Expected result: True.
